backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with authorization, storage mixins, data types, and mutable maps for users, products, orders, media, publications, and appointments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features related to removing a Hero background image and deleting a static asset file, including associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing UI components, styling, media sections, hooks, and store logic across the React app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication, profile setup, payment status routing, and rendering all primary site sections.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section with parallax backgrounds, portrait display, dynamic mouse‑based parallax effects, and biography content fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Booking section enforcing member‑only access, displaying the consulting rate, and offering PayPal link and login/membership prompts.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Shopping cart drawer with item listing, total calculation, Stripe checkout, and cart management actions.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact info using fetched data with icons for phone, email, and location.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Shows credential section with styled images of Ph.D. and Master's diplomas.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer containing detailed professional credentials and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Site header with scroll‑aware styling, navigation links, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Animated hero section with parallax backgrounds and central portrait reacting to mouse movement.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Media section displaying training videos with membership gating and animated visual effects.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Renders the membership section, loading states, plan listings, and PayPal-based subscription handling with user membership checks.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Displays a payment-cancelled message with options to return home or retry, including smooth scroll back to the membership section.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Shows a payment-success screen, invalidates membership-related queries, and offers navigation to home or the media section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects and submits user profile details, validating fields and saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of publications with Amazon links and includes a PayPal payment portal section.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Shows a list of hardcoded apparel items with purchase links and QR codes, styled within a themed section.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal allowing entry and saving of Stripe secret key and allowed countries via mutation.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Static section displaying Venmo and Cash App donation cards with styled backgrounds and links.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Fetches and displays training videos and documents with loading states and PayPal link.
frontend/src/components/VideoModal.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing access control and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping various backend actor calls for profiles, content, store access, and training materials.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, and custom utility classes for glow, shadows, and decorative effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetUrl.ts: Provides a helper to build URL-encoded asset paths, handling absolute URLs and existing /assets/ prefixes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requests, and current state for the hero image removal task.
